TopicTitle: Make a GOTY edition to include all DLC

Articles.Content:
One way Payday 2 solved the DLC dilemma is to basically include DLCs (which they have tons) into oen package, and only offer that version. Then using Steam's ability to subtract price as needed, allow people to only paid for the missing DLC (which is how I got the Ultimate Edition withotu paying for the full price)

Perhaps Squad can do that for KSP.
